scripts:
set ACL on /content 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /content/dam/vision-portal 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /var 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /tmp 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /etc 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /conf 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /home 
 allow jcr:read for xlstudio_read 
 end

set ACL on /content 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end

set ACL on /content/dam/vision-portal 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end

set ACL on /var 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end

set ACL on /tmp 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end

set ACL on /conf 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end

set ACL on /etc 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end

set ACL on /home 
 allow jcr:all for xlstudio_write 
 end
